Languages & Certifications: Comfortable with Python, JavaScript, BASH, PowerShell.
Hardware & Cloud: Experienced with Microsoft, Linux, Apple, iOS, and Android operating systems.
Certified in Microsoft Azure Products (Entra, IaaS, PaaS, SaaS, Migration, Analytics, Security).
Administration of VMs on bare-metal and Azure.
Home Lab Environment: Consists of Linux distros (Debian, Fedora, Mint, Raspbian), and VMs.
Unifi devices for networking and security.
Small devices like Raspberry Pi, PiHole, Recursive DNS, NAS, and retro gaming rigs.
Communication & Documentation: Clear and concise written and verbal communication.
20+ years of customer service in forward-facing roles.
Worked in both the field and office, face-to-face, and over the phone/video conferencing.
People Skills: Background in sales, office management, and other forward-facing environments where collaborating with diverse teams and clientele was at the core of the job.

experience.title: IT Technician
responsibilities: Prepare, deliver, install designated hardware to their locations.
Document deployments and report any discrepancies or concerns.
Add software packages and monitor progress.
Identify and retrieve hardware for recycling or redeployment.

responsibilities: Self-directed positions of successively greater responsibility.
Achieved advanced designations in property/casualty and life/health insurance.
Managed sensitive and confidential information from clients, carriers, and company documentation including portfolios.
Negotiated contract terms, coverage, and pricing.
Consistently maximized both product quality for the consumer and revenue for the company.

experience.title: Operations & Testing
responsibilities: Managed numerous COVID-19 testing and vaccination sites throughout Colorado from setup to teardown.
Supervised large and small teams of people in highly regulated environments.
Maintained a high level of expertise about subject matter and maintained complex logistics.
Helped thousands of patients during this incredibly difficult time.

responsibilities: Planned and oversaw large-scale, high-profile events for the law firm.
Optimized resources while staying within tight budgets.
Secured favorable contracts from outside vendors.
Maintained a high level of attention to detail, strong soft skills, while solving problems under pressure.

interests.title: Gaming
